definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: Isr.’s sacrifices, [[מִחְרַיִם]] ´[[ת]]: (gen. obj.) Ex 8:22, Ex 8:22 (E), cf. Ge 46:34 (J); [[למחרים]] ´[[ת]]: Ge 43:32 (J); [[לְ]] ´[[ת]]: of physical repugnance Ps 88:9.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: to God and his people: ´[[ת]]: of unclean food De 14:3; worshipper of idols Is 41:24, cf. Je 2:7; various objectionable acts: ´[[לפני י]] :´[[ת]]: De 24:4; ´[[י]] :´[[ת]]: De 7:25 ([[חֵרֶם]], cf. v:De 7:26), De 17:1, De 18:12, De 22:5, De 23:19, De 27:15; offering of children ([[עשׂה]]) De 12:31, cf. Je 32:35, also pl. 2Ki 16:3 = 2Ch 28:3, De 18:9, De 18:12 ( + witchcraft); idolatrous practices (sts. with other illegal acts) ´[[ת]]:([[כ]])[[עשׂה ]] De 13:15, De 17:4, Ez Eze 16:50, Eze 18:12, Mal 2:11 (intermarriage with idolaters), cf. Je 44:4; usu. c. pl. noun De 20:18, 1Ki 14:24, 2Ki 21:2, 2Ki 21:11, 2Ch 33:2, 2Ch 36:8, Je 7:10, Je 44:22, Ez Eze 8:6 + 12 t. Ez.; cf. [[תועבות]] 2Ch 36:14, Ezr 9:1, Ezr 9:11, Ezr 9:14, Ez Eze 5:9 + 18 t. Ez.; of idols De 32:16; ([[תועבה]]) 2Ki 23:13, Is 44:19 (cf. De 27:15); idolatrous objects 2Ch 34:33; ‖[[שׁקּוחים ]] Je 16:18 (R:JE) Ez Eze 5:11, Eze 11:18, Eze 11:21, (´[[חַלְמֵי ת]]:) Eze 7:20; ‖[[גלולים ]] Eze 14:6, cf. Eze 6:9; ´[[גִּלּוּלֵי ת]]: Eze 16:36.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: to God and his people: ´[[ת]]: of sacrifice of wicked Pr 21:27 (cf. Pr 15:8), his prayers Pr 28:9 cf. Is 1:13 ([[לְ]] ´[[ת]]:), prob. also Je 6:15 = Je 8:12 (of various kinds of wickedness); unchastity Le 18:22; c. [[עשׂה]] Le 20:13 (H) Ez Eze 22:11, Eze 33:26; cf. [[תועבות]] Le 18:26, Le 18:27, Le 18:29 (cf. v:Le 18:30; H), also Pr 26:25; ´[[י]] :´[[ת]]: De 25:16, Pr 3:32 + 10 t. Pr., cf. Pr 6:16.
